articles.title: Rupee falls to record low, cenbank likely steps in - Reuters
articles.description: The Indian rupee hit a record low on Wednesday on aggressive dollar bids by local oil companies, importers and equity-related outflows, while likely central bank intervention capped losses, traders said.
